r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Fix for BIGINT fix for i5. Fix for autocommit issue (CLI setting is now handled). Fix for db2_pconnect connection reset issue. Fix for connection rollback in db2_pconnect at the end of request.
